title: Finding the Determinant
text: The determinant of the matrix is goven by $$a d-b c$$. This means that the determinant is (29).

title: Multiplying the Determinant with the Changed Matrix
text: We must modify the matrix into the form $$\begin{bmatrix} d & -b \\ -c & a \end{bmatrix}$$. We now have $$\begin{bmatrix} 9 & 2 \\ -1 & 3 \end{bmatrix}$$. We now divide the matrix by $$29$$ to get $$\begin{bmatrix} 9 & 2 \\ -1 & 3 \end{bmatrix}/29$$
